stories.headline: Making the Waves: TV Transformed
stories.summary: Stuart Watson discusses the slow adoption of computer-assisted reporting in television, sharing experiences from the NICAR basic boot camp.

stories.headline: Campaign Finance: Access Granted
stories.summary: Ray Robinson and his team investigate campaign contributions in Virginia, uncovering significant donations from a single small office linked to multiple corporations.

stories.headline: Problem Paramedics
stories.summary: An investigation into Arizona paramedics found many with undisclosed criminal backgrounds, revealing flaws in the certification process.

stories.headline: CAR Hits the Road
stories.summary: A series on chronic speed offenders and parking violations in Nashville led to unexpected legal consequences for some offenders.
